messages.title: Your local vote will decide the next Prime Minister

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Brexit done with a deal, More funding available for schools across Wales
An extra £1.2 billion for the Welsh NHS, 20,000 more nurses
Cutting income tax for 32 million people
£700 million to deliver Growth Deals across Wales

mentions.candidate: Matthew Evans, Local campaigner and experienced councillor
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Jeremy Corbyn propped up by Nicola Sturgeon
mentions.partyLeader: Your local vote will decide the next Prime Minister (Images of Boris Johnson and Jeremy Corbyn)
mentions.tacticalSituation: This election will be close. YOUR LOCAL VOTE will decide it.

issues.education: More funding available for schools across Wales
issues.health: An extra £1.2 billion for the Welsh NHS, 20,000 more nurses
issues.socialWelfare: Cutting income tax for 32 million people

leaflet.personalStatement: Has a plan to improve our city and deliver for local residents.
